title: Strengthening System Design Practical Skills: Ontology-Based Sustainable Energy Simulation Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Concepts and Intermediate-Level Understanding of Energy Systems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze interactive elements of sustainable energy systems using ontology structures
Energy optimization problems can be expressed through mathematical modeling and solutions can be proposed in a VR simulation environment
Energy education scenarios can be mapped to an ontology framework according to learning design reusability principles
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
